marklogic.body:
Dear IGN:
The Gunblade is not supposed to be a hand gun. In the fiction of the FFVIII universe, the gun-like handle and trigger are designed to release a reverberation in the blade that will it into a more powerful Slice. Thus, the mechanism for "firing" the Gunblade is actually designed to alleviate the user in the arduous task of wielding such a big hunk of metal. If you actually look at the Gunblade there's so Spot for a bullet to be released anyway.
